header_2_font_size=”36px” custom_margin=”||6px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We protect what matters to you

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffa40d” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” _builder_version=”4.24.2″ max_width=”70px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” animation_starting_opacity=”100%” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”54px” _builder_version=”4.24.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.8em” ul_line_height=”1.8em” width=”86%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Hiring a private investigator for your personal crisis is the first step towards getting the critical context you need to make complex decisions. For many Americans, their conception of a private investigator includes things like unsettling surveillance, documenting a shady character’s  movements, and film noir. The reality is that a private investigator carries a flexible skillset that can be applied to multiple areas of your personal life, depending on the private investigator’s practice and specialty.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_video src=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3_1yj8r4AP0″ _builder_version=”4.24.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”41px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”70%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||67px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://lauthinveststg.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/pexels-andrea-piacquadio-3760072-1024×683.jpg” alt=”Lauth protects what matters to you” title_text=”pexels-pixabay-267582-2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”15px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”54px” _builder_version=”4.24.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”17px” text_line_height=”1.8em” ul_line_height=”1.8em” width=”86%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At Lauth Investigations International, we believe knowledge is power. We pride ourselves on using our diverse list of private client services to empower our clients with the knowledge they desperately need in times of crisis. Our team of private investigators is comprised of former military and law enforcement who are ready to apply our methodology to your case. We carry a glowing A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau, and we regularly garner 5-star reviews from grateful clients. Call Lauth today for a free consultation on how our private investigations services can bring you clarity.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.24.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||6px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″
